name: Star Catch (Dweeble, CrazyBitez, AwkWeirdMel)
description:
✦ About The Game ✦

Star Catch is a student project created by Hannah Mayorga, Emelda Price, and Megan Majstorovic made with the theme of designing a game for the casual mobile game market. 

In Star Catch your goal is to collect as many falling stars as you can in your nice wicker basket, but be careful! Meteors are raining down from above and can break your basket in an instant.  

⭑ Controls ⭑

Move Left - A | Move Right - D | Select Items - Left Mouse

Collect as many stars as you can and spend your hard-earned stars in the shop! Buy new baskets to change up your look! Check out all the cool baskets you can collect!

✦ The Creators ✦

☄️Hannah Mayorga -  Coding, level design

☄️Emelda Price - Artwork, Particle Effects

☄️Megan Majstorovic - Music, Artwork

✦ Known Issues ✦
  • Some shop baskets don't have the right size colliders thus messing up collision detection.
  • The final score counter on the Game Over screen resets to 0 instead of displaying the final score for that round.
  • The shop is run off of player highscore instead of total points.
  • Currently, when downloading and running the game the shop page doesn't format correctly and is pretty much unusable at the moment :( The game was originally made for phone size so this might contribute to the issue. To see the full functioning shop, watch the demo video above!
  • Particle effects are not shown in gameplay footage due to issues with Unity (let us know if the particle effects work in your game!)

Please reach out to any of the creators if you find a new bug! We will work hard to fix the current known issues above and appreciate all feedback :D

🌟Follow Star Catch on Twitter at @StarCatch22 🌟
